topic.title: How to Factory Reset Akuvox Phones
topic.shortdesc: This guide takes Akuvox SP-R55G running firmware 55.0.6.134 as an example.

ol.li:
Find the phone IP address.
Press the OK key when the phone is idle or navigate to Menu Status on the phone.

Log in the phone web interface with your user name and password.
user name: admin
password: admin
Go to Upgrade Basic Reset To Factory Setting , click Submit.

Click OK to reset the phone.
The phone will be reset successfully after startup.
Do not power off during phone startup.
